message: Let's be fair and close the deal quickly!
Let's split it evenly! No need to complicate things further.
You had your chance, now it's my turn. Inflation is costing us both!
Let's cut our losses and settle on a slightly more favorable deal for me.  We can both benefit from ending the game and avoiding further inflation.
I'm willing to take a bigger share to compensate for the inflation loss. You're losing more than me, so let's end this!
